Entries.Utility.cs.5371: @... Lizzandra... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you husband and wife!$h
Entries.Utility.cs.5377: @... Lizzandra... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you wife and..., well, wife!$h
Entries.Utility.cs.5367: When @ first arrived in Pelican Town, no one knew if he'd fit in with our community...#$b#But from this day forward, @ is going to be as much a part of this town as any of us!$h#$b#It is my great honor on this day {0} of {1}, to unite @ and Lizzandra in the bonds of marriage.
Entries.Utility.cs.5369: When @ first arrived in Pelican Town, no one knew if she'd fit in with our community...#$b#But from this day forward, @ is going to be as much a part of this town as any of us!$h#$b#It is my great honor on this day {0} of {1}, to unite @ and Lizzandra in the bonds of marriage.

Entries.958800/f Lizzandra 1000/t 800 1300/w sun: playful/39 13/farmer 53 14 3 Lizzandra 39 11 2/skippable/showFrame Lizzandra 29/move farmer -14 0 3/speak Lizzandra "OH!"/jump farmer/faceDirection farmer 0/speak Lizzandra "Hey @.."/emote farmer 40/move farmer 0 -2 0/speak Lizzandra "I have something to say."/pause 500/speak Lizzandra "I uh..."/emote farmer 8/speak Lizzandra "If I had a deep secret, you'd be the first I'd tell."/emote farmer 16/jump farmer/faceDirection farmer 2/emote farmer 60/animate Lizzandra false true 330 30 31 30 31/speak Lizzandra "What I mean is uh..I sharing secrets to someone who is special to me."/stopAnimation Lizzandra/showFrame Lizzandra 29/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 500/speak Lizzandra "I like you, a lot. And I.."/pause 500/speak Lizzandra "I'm just..maybe..*sigh*"/faceDirection farmer 2/emote farmer 60/faceDirection farmer 0/speak Lizzandra "I just never thought it'd come to this with my feelings about someone."/pause 500/speak Lizzandra "I'll come visit you today at your place..after dark,I want to tell you many things."/move Lizzandra 20 0 1 true/faceDirection farmer 1/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
